ticket.title: SyntaxError when prefixing delegation to instance variable
ticket.original-body:
When using `:prefix => true` in a delegation to an instance or class variable, a SyntaxError is raised:
compile error\n(__DELEGATION__):1: syntax error, unexpected '(', expecting tCOLON2 or '.'
This patch checks the `:to` value if `:prefix => true` is set, raising an ArgumentError if it matches `^[^a-z_]`, that is, if it doesn't look like a method name.
ticket.latest-body:
When using `:prefix => true` in a delegation to an instance or class variable, a SyntaxError is raised:
compile error\n(__DELEGATION__):1: syntax error, unexpected '(', expecting tCOLON2 or '.'
This patch checks the `:to` value if `:prefix => true` is set, raising an ArgumentError if it matches `^[^a-z_]`, that is, if it doesn't look like a method name.

When using :prefix => true in a delegation to an instance or class variable, a SyntaxError is raised:

compile error\n(__DELEGATION__):1: syntax error, unexpected '(', expecting tCOLON2 or '.'

This patch checks the :to value if :prefix => true is set, raising an ArgumentError if it matches ^[^a-z_], that is, if it doesn't look like a method name.

When using :prefix => true in a delegation to an instance or class variable, a SyntaxError is raised:

compile error\n(__DELEGATION__):1: syntax error, unexpected '(', expecting tCOLON2 or '.'

This patch checks the :to value if :prefix => true is set, raising an ArgumentError if it matches ^[^a-z_], that is, if it doesn't look like a method name.
version.title: SyntaxError when prefixing delegation to instance variable

version.body:
Bump.
This is a crasher -- would anyone care to take a look at it? It's a rather trivial patch, and comes with a test 'n all.
version.body-html:
Bump.

This is a crasher -- would anyone care to take a look at it? It's a rather trivial patch, and comes with a test 'n all.
version.title: SyntaxError when prefixing delegation to instance variable

version.body:
(from [2f7c073f1981ee2e901e33606c8f864fbb10dc4c]) Ensure only delegations to methods can have an automatic prefix. [#1235 state:resolved]
Signed-off-by: Pratik Naik <pratiknaik@gmail.com> http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/2f7c073f1981ee2e901e33606c8f864fbb10dc4c
version.body-html:
(from [2f7c073f1981ee2e901e33606c8f864fbb10dc4c]) Ensure only delegations to methods can have an automatic prefix. [#1235 state:resolved]

Signed-off-by: Pratik Naik pratiknaik@gmail.com http://github.com/rails/rails/co...
